title: Connecting to the internet using mobile network on 4a (I have tried the methods in this help center)
content:
Hello, 
With my Google Pixel 4a, I cannot connect to the internet using the mobile network. 
I have tried restarting the phone, I have reset network connections, and I have changed the prefered network type. Nothing helped. 
The same sim does not have any problems on other devices.
I was wondering of you can help me with this issue. 
Regards,
